title: 默认玩家组到底是哪一个玩家组【给我名字！】
author: iwinhoo
txt_content: 我用的是正常的Ess权限插件，没有任何改动，请问哪一个是默认权限组，绿色名字的，def那个弄出来是黄色名字没有任何权限，我想给默认玩家组添加权限该怎么办啊？给个指令，求助！

replies.author: 周润发
replies.txt_content:
写着
default：true
就是默认玩家权限组了，

replies.author: qq1053685216
replies.txt_content:
不是build才是默认权限组- -
如果要弄VIP组可以把BUILD组的权限直接给然后在加上FLY之类的- -

replies.author: 庐州月
replies.txt_content: default是默认组，有基础权限的组是builder

replies.author: iwinhoo
replies.txt_content:
庐州月 发表于 2015-2-3 17:35
default是默认组，有基础权限的组是builder
# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# and are inherited from the GlobalGroups.yml.
#
# Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world
# and are defined in the this groups.yml file.
#
# Local group inheritances define your promotion tree when using 'manpromote/mandemote'

groups:
  Default:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:
      prefix: '&e'
      build: false
      suffix: ''
  Owner:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -vanish.*
    - '*'
    inheritance:
    - admin
    info:
      prefix: '&4'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Builder:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - paintball.general
    - panintball.shop.not<id>
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      prefix: '&2'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Moderator:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - builder
    - g:groupmanager_moderator
    - g:bukkit_moderator
    - g:essentials_moderator
    - g:towny_moderator
    - g:vanish_moderator
    info:
      prefix: '&5'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Admin:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - moderator
    - g:groupmanager_admin
    - g:bukkit_admin
    - g:essentials_admin
    - g:towny_admin
    - g:vanish_admin
    info:
      prefix: '&c'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
在这一坨子子里，是不是builder为默认组？我想加入paintball.general权限和panintball.shop.not<id>权限怎么办？

replies.author: 光の旋律
replies.txt_content:
iwinhoo 发表于 2015-2-3 18:06
# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
普通玩家默认拥有builder和default两个权限组的所有权限
加到哪个里都行，推荐加到default里
因为builder权限组里都是和建造有关的权限
